revised_title: A New Method of Approximation for Elliptic and Ultra-Elliptic Functions
tldr: The author presents a new method of approximation for elliptic and ultra-elliptic functions, building upon previous work by Mr. Sylvester. The method involves the use of rational approximation, partial fractions, and quadratures to facilitate computation. The author also provides auxiliary tables and formulae for using trigonometrical tables with greater precision.
